name: Colossal Biodome
desc: A vast biodome designed to serve as an orbital arcology. Increases crew capacity by %s, and cargo capacity by %s. Provides a large flux buffer but obstructs venting space, increasing flux capacity by %s but decreasing dissipation by %s.
short: Increases crew and cargo capacity, alters flux stats.

name: Improved Automatics
desc: Decreases minimum crew required by %s, and increases the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s.
short: Decreases crew required and increases monthly maintenance.

name: Terraforming Bays
desc: Colossal bays for terraforming equipment - largely empty. Increases cargo capacity by %s. Increases the resources gained from salvaging by %s. %s of the bonus applies to post-battle salvage. Reduces the heavy machinery and supplies required to perform surveys by %s, down to a minimum of %s for each.
short: Increases cargo capacity, resources gained from salvage, and reduces resource requirements for surveying.
